files.description: Single CLI entrypoint that creates outputs/, runs a deterministic toy experiment producing artifacts, writes outputs/index.md manifest, and exits with nonzero status on any failure.
CI workflow that checks out the repo, runs scripts/run_pipeline.py on pushes/PRs, and fails the build if the pipeline exits nonzero or expected outputs are missing.

missionDescription: Create/standardize scripts/run_pipeline.py as the sole entrypoint; ensure it creates ./outputs, runs the toy experiment, writes the manifest (./outputs/index.md), and exits nonzero on failure.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Reinforces the single deterministic entrypoint requirement (scripts/run_pipeline.py or python -m package.run) so a fresh clone can generate artifacts predictably and populate ./outputs without manual ...
